title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a State of the Art Agentic Infrastructure (AIM297)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建最先进的智能体基础设施 (AIM297)
abstract: The prompt is the new browser. It’s no secret that AI agents will transform how people interact with information and services, but what’s often overlooked is how agents can only thrive on the right foundation. Agents demand a new layer of connectivity, control, and security. Join Alex Drag and Michael Field from Kong as they explore how agents are becoming the new backbone of the internet — and what builders can do to get ready for it. This presentation is brought to you by Kong, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 提示词是新的浏览器。AI代理将改变人们与信息和服务交互的方式已不是秘密，但常被忽视的是，代理只能在正确的基础上蓬勃发展。代理需要新的连接、控制和安全层。加入Kong的Alex Drag和Michael Field，探索代理如何成为互联网的新支柱——以及构建者可以做些什么来为此做好准备。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Kong提供。
